About Me
  • Home
  • Publications
Fengqing Jiang
University of Washington

I am currently a 4th Ph.D. student at University of Washington under supervising of . Prof. Radha Poovendran. I am fortunate to work with Prof. Luyao Niu, and Prof. Bill Yuchen Lin at UW. I also closely work with Prof. Bo Li at UIUC and Prof. Zhen Xiang at University of Georgia.

My research interests is about building better AGI system. My works recently concentrates on LLM/Agent/LMM, topics span post-training&alignmennt/safety&security/reinforcement learning/agentic training/reasoning/data synthesis. I also worked on Machine Learning Security and Federated Learning.

If you have questions about my work, seek for collaboration, or just want to chat, feel free to contact me. Also if you are students looking for research opportunity/PhD position in our group, I am glad to help.
